channel.title: DevOps on Hugo Ivy
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on Hugo Ivy

item.title: Ansible Part 1
item.description: Ansible is a config management tool sample inventory file is /etc/ansible/hosts This is the default ansible ‘hosts’ file. # It should live in /etc/ansible/hosts # - Comments begin with the ‘#’ character - Blank lines are ignored - Groups of hosts are delimited by [header] elements - You can enter hostnames or ip addresses - A hostname/ip can be a member of multiple groups Ex 1: Ungrouped hosts, specify before any group headers.
